prompts: Create a fluffy, white Pokemon that resembles a sheep and has big, expressive eyes.
Show me a gentle Normal-type Pokemon that enjoys grazing in grassy fields.
Imagine a cute Pokemon that can roll into a ball to defend itself from attacks.
Design a small, round Pokemon that loves interacting with trainers and other creatures.
Generate a charming Pokemon that has a soft, wooly coat and is often seen in flocks.
Make a playful Pokemon that embodies the spirit of kindness and tranquility in nature.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in serene environments and has a calming presence.
